spell.spellbladenext.transmute_fire.name: Transmute Copper
spell.spellbladenext.transmute_fire.desc: Transmute a single block of iron into four runeblazing ingots.
spell.spellbladenext.transmute_frost.des: Transmute a single block of iron into four runefrosted ingots.
spell.spellbladenext.transmute_arcane.de: Transmute a single block of iron into four runegleaming ingots.
spell.spellbladenext.magma_orb.name: Magma Orb
spell.spellbladenext.magma_orb.descripti: Launch a Magma Orb that deals {damage} fire damage in an area when it bounces.
spell.spellbladenext.sonic_boom.name: Sonic Boom
spell.spellbladenext.sonic_boom.descript: Unleash a Sonic Boom in the targeted direction, dealing {damage} arcane damage to enemies in line of sight, half to enemies behind walls.
spell.spellbladenext.glacial_barrage.des: Launch a barrage of Icicles as you channel, dealing {damage} frost damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.horizontal_eruption: Unleash a devastating wave of embers. Each flame deals {damage} fire damage.
spell.spellbladenext.vertical_eruption.d: Unleash a devastating column of embers. Each flame deals {damage} fire damage
spell.spellbladenext.icicle_barrier.name: Icestorm
spell.spellbladenext.icicle_barrier.desc: Create Icicles that orbit you in a spiral, dealing {damage} frost damage every 0.5 seconds and disappearing after 2 seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.cleansing_fire.name: Bellows Stance
spell.spellbladenext.cleansing_fire.desc: Enter a stance that repels nearby enemies and releases flaming, homing projectiles at them every half second, each dealing {damage} fire damage.
spell.spellbladenext.amethyst_rain.name: Amethyst Rain
spell.spellbladenext.amethyst_rain.descr: Launch four Amethysts into the air that slow down to a halt, and then home into the nearest enemy, each dealing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.flame_winds.name: Scorching Wind
spell.spellbladenext.flame_winds.descrip: Launch a sphere of scorching air in a direction, dealing {damage} fire damage per second to enemies caught in it and carrying them in the direction of the wind.
spell.spellbladenext.endersgaze.name: Ender's Gaze
spell.spellbladenext.endersgaze.descript: Shoot a slow moving ender pearl. The first enemy hit gains five rotating ender eyes for 4 seconds, each dealing {damage} arcane damage every two-fifths of a second. If the enemy dies, the eyes detach, refreshing their durations if they find new hosts.
spell.spellbladenext.snowball_bombardmen: Channel to summon three snowballs that rotate around you every 1/4 second. These snowballs orbit once and then launch themsenves into the sky towards a random enemy in the direction you are looking, dealing {damage} frost damage.
spell.spellbladenext.explosion.name: Combust
spell.spellbladenext.explosion.descripti: Summon a delayed explosion at the target or target enemy, dealing up to {damage} damage at the center of the explosion to ALL enemies except you.
